Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/automation_rules/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "payload": {
    "id": 90,
    "account_id": 1,
    "name": "add-label-bug-if-message-contains-bug",
    "description": "add-label-bug-if-message-contains-bug",
    "event_name": "message_created",
    "conditions": [\
      {\
        "values": [\
          "incoming"\
        ],\
        "attribute_key": "message_type",\
        "query_operator": "and",\
        "filter_operator": "equal_to"\
      },\
      {\
        "values": [\
          "bug"\
        ],\
        "attribute_key": "content",\
        "filter_operator": "contains"\
      }\
    ],
    "actions": [\

        "action_name": "add_label",\
        "action_params": [\

  }
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The ID of the automation rule to be updated.

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]object

Response payload that contains automation rule(s)
Array of automation rules (for listing endpoint)

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-id)

id

integer

The ID of the automation rule

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-account-id)

account\_id

integer

Account Id

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-name)

name

string

The name of the rule

Example:

`"Add label on message create event"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-description)

description

string

Description to give more context about the rule

Example:

`"Add label support and sales on message create event if incoming message content contains text help"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-event-name)

event\_name

enum<string>

Automation Rule event, on which we call the actions(conversation\_created, conversation\_updated, message\_created)

Available options:

`conversation_created`,

`conversation_updated`,

`message_created`

Example:

`"message_created"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/get-a-automation-rule-details#response-conditions)

conditions

object\[\]

Array of conditions on which conversation/message filter would work

Show child attributes
